name: SUPER MARIO MANIA (SimpleTeam)
description:
The Demo is available!

In this project, we are going to remake the best levels of Mario games.

A vote is going to be organized to pick the next levels.

Controls:

Move: arrow keys / gamepad( joystic)k

Accept: space bar / gamepad (A)

Pause: enter / gamepad (start)

Jump: spacebar / gamepad (A)

Throw Cappy: Q/ gamepad (X)

Sprint: S/ gamepad (L2)

Dive: D/ gamepad (R2)

Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPOduJAyDU1J8G5MNJU8T4w?view_as=subscriber

Credits:

Haitam : Coding + Graphics

BobNL : Musics

#fangame #action #platformer
